Name: Name Change, East 22nd Street/Elmore Place, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a street name, East 22nd Street/Elmore Place, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________ 
New name			Present name			Limits
________________________________________________________________
East 22nd Street/		East 22nd Street	between Campus Road
Elmore Place						and Foster Avenue



	�2.  The new name shall be indicated on the city map and  signs bearing the new name shall be erected in place of signs bearing the present name. 
�3.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
